title: Summer Monteys-Fullam takes break from packed diary to enjoy the Cyprus sunshine
text:
Summer Monteys-Fullam is in full holiday mode (Picture: Click News And Media)

Summer Monteys-Fullam took a break from her packed diary to enjoy a quick trip to Cyprus with pals – although we’re not too sure on her beach of choice.

How she managed to find a comfortable spot for her towel among all those pebbles we’ll never know.

The 24-year-old was pictured getting in some rays in a white bikini, with the ex-girlfriend of Great British Bake off judge Paul Hollywood also snapping some selfies for the ‘gram.

Understandable.

#Holiday.

The 24-year-old was pictured getting in some rays in a white bikini (Picture: Click News And Media)

#Holiday. (Picture: Click News And Media)

Summer rose to fame when she started dating Paul (Picture: Click News And Media)

Summer rose to fame when she started dating Paul but ever since the two broke up, she has been seen at endless events.

Advertisement

Advertisement

The pair split reportedly when he asked her to sign a non-disclosure agreement on their relationship, although Summer recently admitted that although she never ‘asked’ for a life of fame, she isn’t closing the doors that are opening.

Summer and Paul reportedly when he asked her to sign a non-disclosure agreement(Picture: Click News And Media)

‘It’s been an adventure’ (Picture: Click News And Media)

Speaking of being thrust into the spotlight, she said: ‘It’s been an adventure, and I’ve taken it in my stride, I will continue to be true to myself and not get lost.’

But she added: ‘I didn’t ask for this. I didn’t ask for these doors to be opened, the world sucked me into it – in a good way, a really good way – and now I want to see what my options are.’

I didn’t ask for these doors to be opened,’ said Summer (Picture: Click News And Media)

How she managed to find a comfortable spot for her towel among all those pebbles we’ll never know. (Picture: Click News And Media)

Paul Hollywood’s ex is also reportedly looking to turn her family into the Kardashians of Kent, according to reports, with Summer along with her mother Sabina and businesswoman sister Saskia said to be nicknamed ‘Kent Kardashians’ by their friends due to the influence of their mother.

Kris Jenner would be so proud.

Gotta take those pics for the ‘gram (Picture: Click News And Media)

Sources told The Mirror: ‘Their nickname from friends, mainly towards the mum, eldest daughter Saskia and Summer are the Kent Kardashians.’

Advertisement

Advertisement

Momager Kris Jenner famously manages all her children and Sabina is said to be following in her footsteps by looking after her girls’ careers, with the idea to keep their fame for as long as possible sparked by Sabina as she ‘sees herself as a Kris Jenner figure’.

A representative for Summer said: ‘Sabina has no input into [Summer’s] management or career but obviously as any mother would, wants the best for her daughter.’
